title: Diffusion breeding and releasing method for preventing myzus persicae through harmonia axyridis
assignees: Yunnan Reascend Tobacco Technology Group Co Ltd

events.title: Application filed by Yunnan Reascend Tobacco Technology Group Co Ltd
events.assignee_search: Yunnan Reascend Tobacco Technology Group Co Ltd

abstract: The invention discloses a diffusion breeding and releasing method for preventing myzus persicae through harmonia axyridis. The myzus persicae is bred in a diffusion breeding shed, and an insect-proof net (7) covers the diffusion breeding shed; a tobacco seedling is cultivated through a floating method; when the tobacco seedling has five to six true leaves, tobacco leaves with the myzus persicae are put on the tobacco seedling to breed the myzus persicae; male and female harmonia axyridis adults captured in the wild are put into the insect-proof net, eat the myzus persicae and then mate to lay eggs; the eggs are incubated into larvae, or low-age larvae are directly collected, or after the larvae are pupated, pupae are taken back for eclosion at room temperature; the eclosion adults are fed with the myzus persicae and are put into a refrigerator for refrigeration and storage; the low-age larvae or the adults of the harmonia axyridis are put into a low-age larva transporting and releasing device (9) or an adult transporting and releasing device (10); the low-age larvae or the adults of the harmonia axyridis are released to a field according to a ratio of the harmonia axyridis to the myzus persicae of 1:(100-120) in a preliminary forming stage of the myzus persicae in the field. According to the method, the breeding speed rate of the harmonia axyridis can be remarkably improved, and the field pest control efficiency is improved in a mode of preventing the myzus persicae through the harmonia axyridis.
claims: 2. method for releasing is bred in the diffusion of a kind of harmonia axyridia control cigarette aphid according to claim 1, it is characterized in that, described diffusion breeding canopy includes disjunctor frame (1) and the peripheral plastic film (3) with the ridged ceiling, ceiling is coated with sunshade net (4), be provided with at least two diffusion propagation houses (8) of mutual separation in canopy, each diffusion propagation house comprises bottom nursery pond (2) and covers on the fly net (7) on nursery pond, in the nursery pond of each diffusion propagation house (8), is provided with and floats dish (5).

3. method for releasing is bred in the diffusion of a kind of harmonia axyridia control cigarette aphid according to claim 2, it is characterized in that, described fly net (7) adopts the mosquito-curtain type opening.

4. method for releasing is bred in the diffusion of a kind of harmonia axyridia control cigarette aphid according to claim 2, it is characterized in that, in the nursery pond of each diffusion propagation house (8), is provided with brick bridge (6).

5. method for releasing is bred in the diffusion of a kind of harmonia axyridia control cigarette aphid according to claim 1, it is characterized in that the larva that described low instar larvae was 2～3 ages.

6. method for releasing is bred in the diffusion of a kind of harmonia axyridia control cigarette aphid according to claim 1, it is characterized in that, in above-mentioned steps (b), the releasing device of low instar larvae is the cube box body, offer through wires hole (9-2) at the box body upper bottom surface, anchor line (string) rope (9-1) end system has cotton-wool (9-3) and tens of the fluffy thin paper slips (9-4) of rubbing wrinkle also to be suspended from box body through through wires hole, box body one side is provided with the disposable push type opening (9-5) of uniform air-vent (9-6), the box body bottom surface is equipped with the scraps of paper (9-7), be covered with the feed (9-8) for larval feeding on the scraps of paper, the releasing device of adult is also the cube box body, the box body upper bottom surface offers through wires hole (10-2), the cotton-wool (10-4) that anchor line (string) rope (10-1) end system has gauze to encase also is suspended from box body through through wires hole, and box body one side is provided with the disposable push type opening (10-5) of uniform air-vent (10-6).

7. breed method for releasing according to the diffusion of claim 1 or 2 or 3 or 4 or 5 or 6 described a kind of harmonia axyridia control cigarette aphids, it is characterized in that, when on the cigarette seedling, cigarette aphid amount reaches about 10～12 head/plants, to be transferred on the cigarette seedling of aphid rareness with the aphid tobacco leaf in time, and keep diffusion to breed 20～30 ℃ of temperature of shed, humidity 60%～75%.

8. breed method for releasing according to the diffusion of claim 1 or 2 or 3 or 4 or 5 or 6 described a kind of harmonia axyridia control cigarette aphids, it is characterized in that, in above-mentioned steps (a), when on the cigarette seedling, cigarette aphid amount reaches 400～500 head/plants, in the wooden dipper aphid of 1:10000～12000 than by Imagoes of Harmonia Axyridis in female worm: the ratio that male worm is 5:2 is put into the fly net mate and oviposit, hatching is grown to low instar larvae, puts into the fresh insect box with the aphid tobacco leaf standby; Perhaps directly collect pupa, put into the insect box that bottom is covered with moistening filter paper, be placed in 25 ± 2 ℃ of temperature, treat its emergence under humidity 70 ± 5% conditions, after the adult sprouted wings is fed, the cotton balls that the hydromel that to add by concentration be 15% soaks, in 10 ℃ of refrigerator cold-storages, within every 7～10 days, add one time hydromel, within 19～21 days, change a cotton balls.
